body: This adds Tox Quick Name Lookup as an option (currently default module) to toxcore. This is intended to replace ToxDNS, and serve as a additional resource to existing name lookup systems. E.g. https://github.com/LittleVulpix/toxme/ @iphydf I believe that I caught and fixed all the changes requested from the previous pull. I didn't triage this to a milestone, but v0.1.4 would allow me get the changes into uTox for our next release. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/368)
